name: Alpha Aviation Group
about: Alpha Aviation Group is a premier pilot training institution with a global presence, dedicated to training and developing world-class pilots and future leaders in the aviation industry. Established in 2005, AAG has expanded its operations to several regions, including the Philippines, UAE, and India. Our mission is to provide top-of-class pilot training solutions, ensuring our graduates are airline-ready. We emphasize service excellence, teamwork, and customer satisfaction, with a commitment to individualized and highly supportive cadet mentorship. AAG is accredited by ISO for its Quality, Safety, and Environmental Management System and is recognized as an Approved Training Organization. With state-of-the-art training infrastructure and a comprehensive training syllabus, AAG is poised to address the global demand for skilled pilots, aiming to have an AAG-trained pilot in every flight deck in the regions we serve.
services:
["Private Pilot License
Commercial Pilot License
Jet Orientation Course (JOT)
Instrument Rating (IR)
EASA ATPL Ground School"]
